trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKMG105_03677_SEQ_00<tab>Kai-Shirr is anxious to see you and Alphinaud back to Eulmore.
TEXT_LUCKMG105_03677_ALPHINAUD_000_000<tab>Whatever could be so urgent for Lady Chai to summon us thus?
TEXT_LUCKMG105_03677_KAISHIRR_000_020<tab>Lady Chai's up in the parlor. Best not keep her waiting, eh?

TEXT_LUCKMG105_03677_KAISHIRR_000_040<tab>It was the folks over at the Crystarium that told me you'd be down at Journey's Head. And lucky for me, you still were. Running 'round after people's tiring work.
TEXT_LUCKMG105_03677_ALPHINAUD_000_060<tab>Well, naught here seems out of the ordinary, though I do not see Lady Chai anywhere.
TEXT_LUCKMG105_03677_KAISHIRR_000_061<tab>Probably pacing around outside again. Staring off into the distance and all that. Sighing.
TEXT_LUCKMG105_03677_ALPHINAUD_000_062<tab>Strange. Let's see if we can find her, and discover the source of her distress.
